participant_1.background:
I'm a twentysomething female who enjoys horror movies and rock music.
I am a loner and my family are my only friends.
I'm going to try a new recipe for a healthy snack for my kids.
i paddle board on my days off.
I used to be a teacher, but I wanted to spend more time with my family.

I relax at home in my comfortable clothes with a good book.
i am a personal chef.
I remember buying my first baseball card when I was 8 years old.
i like snowboarding.
I have to be careful around my cat when I'm tending to my flower beds, because I've knocked over some pots of flowers in the past.

content.text: Hello there!  How is your day going?
Good, thank you!  How about yours?
Pretty good!  Just trying to think of a healthy snack to make for my kids.
Ooh, nice!  I am a personal chef, so I love cooking.  What are you thinking of making?
I am not sure yet.  I may try making some sort of granola bar or something.
Granola bars are a good choice!  I make them all the time.  Do you have any dietary restrictions or allergies to work around?
Not that I know of.  I just want to make something that is healthy and that they will enjoy.
That's good!  I know it can be tough to find snacks that are healthy and that kids will actually eat.
Yeah, it can be!  I'm glad I have you to help me out!
Of course!  I'm always happy to help.
Thanks!  I think I am going to make some peanut butter energy balls.
Oh, those are delicious!  I love those.  I make them all the time for my clients.
Great!  I'm excited to try them.  I think my kids will like them too.
I'm sure they will!  They are so yummy.
Of course!  Let me know if you have any other questions.
